member.name: T:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.XOMAppsAuthorizeAttribute
member.summary: Provides an authorization attribute responsible for enforcing application wide user security based on the currently logged in user's roles and role permissions.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of with the rolenames set.
member.param: The set of privileges to enforce.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.XOMAppsAuthorizeAttribute.OnAuthorization(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext)
member.summary: Calls when an action is being authorized.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.XOMAppsAuthorizeAttribute.OnAuthorizationAsync(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Calls when an action is being authorized.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.XOMAppsAuthorizeAttribute.IsAuthorized(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified control is authorized.
member.returns: True when the specified control is authorized, otherwise false.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.XOMAppsAuthorizeAttribute.IsUserAuthorized(System.Web.Http.Controllers.HttpActionContext)
member.summary: Helper method responsible for checking the user is authorized to perform the specified action.
member.returns: True when the user is authorized, otherwise false.

member.name: T:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.XOMAppsComponentAuthorizeAttribute
member.summary: Provides an authorization attribute responsible for enforcing component security based on the currently logged in user's component roles and role permissions.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.XOMAppsComponentAuthorizeAttribute.#ctor(XOM.Galileo.BLL.Security.SecurableComponentType,XOM.Galileo.BLL.Security.PrivilegeOptions)

member.summary: Creates a new instance of with the rolenames set.
member.param: The component type for which access must be granted.
The set of privileges to enforce.
Indicates whether or not the component can be identified.
When a component can be identified, represents the name of the parameter in the web request which identifies the component.

member.summary: Calls when an action is being authorized.

member.summary: Calls when an action is being authorized.

member.summary: Given an action context, provides the identified value associated with the identifier value.

member.summary: Indicates whether the specified control is authorized.

member.name: T:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration
member.summary: Provides a set of configurable properties for use as security configrations.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of loading the values from the application configuration file.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.name: P:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.ApplicationLogPath
member.summary:
Gets or sets the file system path where application logs should be stored.
Leave this value blank to store logs in the %TEMP% directory.

member.name: P:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.DatabaseLoggingEnabled
member.summary: When set to true, a database log listener will be enabled and write events to database tables.

member.name: P:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.EnableAutomaticUserCreation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether or not the service will automatically create a new application user when a user browses the site for the first time. The user will also be setup with default credentials based on AD group membership.

member.name: P:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.EnvironmentIsProduction
member.summary: Gets a value which indicates whether or not the environment should be treated as a production environment. If true, the environment will not seed objects which should not be seeded in a production environment and will not auto generate database schema.

member.name: P:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.ForceUserPrincipalResolution
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates whether or not all user updates to resolve the User Principal information from ActiveDirectory for mapped user data fields such as Email, UserName, etc.

member.name: P:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.MigrateDatabaseOnContextInitialization
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which determines whether or not outstanding migrations on the database identified by the SecurityDataContext value will execute on initialization.

member.name: P:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.PreventExcepionLeak
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not exception messages should be returned to clients as generic messages.

member.name: P:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.SeedDebugEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not a debugger will be attached

member.name: P:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.VerboseValidationErrorsEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value which indicates whether or not errors encountered during validation are expanded so as to display verbose error detail including the source of the exception, the type of validation failure encountered, and reason for failure.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.LoadFromConfiguration
member.summary: Loads the configuration settings from the associated application configuration.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.GetConfigurationValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Helper method which retrieves the specified key value from the application settings or the default value when it cannot be found.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.Helpers.ServiceConfiguration.GetConfigurationValueAsBool(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Helper method which retrieves the specified key value from the application settings as a boolean or the default value when it cannot be found.

member.name: M:XOM.Galileo.WebAPI.WebApiApplication.Application_BeginRequest
member.summary: Provides a means of handling CORS Options request for handshake when localhost is Origin.

member.summary: Unhandled application level exceptions get logged.
